response.headline: Hattifnatt cafe in Japan - cute spot 250m from station's north exit with colorful wall-to-wall designs by Marini Monteany
response.summary: Hattifnatt is a cute cafe located 250 meters from the station's north exit, featuring colorful wall-to-wall designs by the two-man art and design team Marini Monteany. The cafe has a folksy exterior with turquoise siding and red-white striped awning.

extracted_text: After spending some time exploring the more eye-catching stores immediately south of the station, I made a quick stop for lunch at
- a cute little cafe 250 meters from the station's north exit, with colorful wall-to-wall designs by the two-man art and design team Marini Monteany.
image_details.key_interest: Hattifnatt cafe recommendation with specific location details
